settings.name: Type of speed
settings.description: Select whether you want to use the 'ground speed' estimate from the source data (typically representing instantaneous ground speed estimated by the GPS) or the speed calculated between consecutive locations. Only select 'ground speed' if you know this is present throughout the data you are evaluating. Please check the App Logs for messages if 'ground speed' was avaiable for any/all locations. Note that start and end locations of each step fulfilling the condition are selected if 'between-location speed' is selected.

settings.name: Annotate only or direction of filtering
settings.description: Select if you want to annotate all locations with speed_class (above or below the threshold) or filter locations with speed above or below the threshold

options.displayText: keep all locations with annotation attribute `speed_class` (high or low)
